title: Removing content..
body:
Instead of removing the content ffs do something about her....Wow its not hard take a bloody look at her scores how long did it take you guys to remove over a bloody year for christ sake....
So are you going to ban me for putting this up...
Really fix that player up..

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Your earlier post was removed for the name and shame. The boards are not the place to report other players, I strongly recommend you report them in game to assist the Instant Feedback system in picking them up. You can also open a support ticket if you want to provide additional information about a particular player.

I've edited the name of the player from your post.

Its has been done for the last 2 days so don't say to do something take a look at her record....
The system is the same 1 she abuses by reporting others because of her feeding remove her and the toxic stops..
Is it that hard to see...
Dont wait for 1 year like RamRam..
You say opening a support ticket,this is telling me the system you want us to use is failing......
Take a look at her stats...is it that hard...as to the naming and shaming really she needs to be called out for christ sake....
And you wonder why players are toxic...
For every action there is a re-action and its the same cycle...

Erm no the player in question is a plain out feeder and abuses the reporting system....
So the toxic behaviour you speak of is a re-action from some 1 else's action...
And by opening a support ticket is plain out saying the game is failing in the reporting system....
Ive said this before and i will say it again,if there are players who report others for nothing they get punished for doing nothing...
For every action there is a reaction which is toxic typing can you not even see what im saying...
There are players that KNOW they wont get a thing done to them because of the system that is in place right now....
This player and his friend have been doing it for ages and not 1 thing has been done....
It took them well over a year to get rid of RamRam.....
Do players have to put up with this......
No they shouldn't there is no witch hunt here m8,its just plain out truth.
Im more then happy to give you the players dets so you can make your own mind up tbh...
By saying there reporting system works is wrong plain out wrong....
This has been going on for years,and it wont change because no1 has the balls to ban players....
Its ok to take there money,but dont ban them.....

Support tickets against players are for extra information, not because the system is failing.

And..sure everyone gets pissed off at that toxic ass player and tilts themselves every now and again but... two toxics don't make a positive, it just makes double the toxic.

If you think the system isn't seeing them, then put in a support ticket, it's not that hard, and usually they will get them a second look.

I think you have several misunderstandings about human psychology to think that reacting to toxic with toxic is gonna help you any. YOU are the person you have control over, so YOU can take your toxic out and it's as simple as muting or not responding. 

I'm not saying you should magically not get frustrated, but maybe use your damn brain a little. You're complaining about someone being toxic, and maybe those that saw the name could the scores sure, but from our perspective, you're the toxic one here m8. Sephyre gave you the board rules which you should have already read, and LemonHunter tried to give you an honest, simple answer and you just went off at them. Yeah, that's really gonna help people not be toxic ey.

I'm not saying the system isn't flawed, or rather, not aggressive enough. I agree. At the very least I think it should be a few more than just the last game reports that get a notification when a player is punished, because I believe it happens more than we see which is incredibly frustrating. If there was more transparency we'd be happier. I would rather an intentional feeder than a toxic anyday, and you seem to misunderstand the system. They CAN'T abuse the report system IF their reports are invalid.

Here's the thing. If they intentionally feed they'll get picked up by the intent feed system ok. The only way they are abusing the report system is by keeping their reports legitimate, you know how they do that? They only report legit toxic people. So if they bait you into toxicity and you respond, then you're only helping them. If you don't get toxic then their report is illegitimate and their reports get thrown out and lose weight, you understand? By responding with toxicity you're making the game worse for yourself and helping them out.

If you wanna respond to toxic with toxic then fine, but don't call bullshit when you get punished for it. You'll get punished for  consistent toxicity eventually whether you started it or not. The system doesn't care who started it in the slightest.

Erm wrong......
Trust me get 2 mates to repeated report you for verbal abuse....You will get chat restrictions...its been proven before....
As to the players not having anything done to them it just proves the point im making and Riot staff know it....
How many games should it be for intentionally feeding because i could give you the players stats right now and you would come back going wtf.....
Trust me its easy to lip service but even harder to ban some 1...
They knew of RamRam,but like i said it took them over 1 year to do anything about him...
What about the players that where called and reported let alone had some form of punishment because of him?
This thing of send a support ticket like ive stated before proves the system is flawed and isnt doing the job..
And you seem to miss the whole point again...players get toxic when other are feeding or trolling is natural human behaviour m8....
So for the last part of your response no one is being toxic m8 but you can get chat restrictions for nothing its a program that responds to reports nothing more trust me....
Take a look at the boards and see there are other threads saying the same thing.....

Selective evidence proves nothing. For every person that wasn't punished there were plenty more that were. But you're clearly just here to complain..in pretty much the worst way possible. If you want something done don't bitch about it. Start a real discussion. It's obvious I'm not going to change your mind, I just have faith that the majority of this community isn't gullible enough to just accept what you're saying. 

It's also human nature to abandon the sick to predators but you'd be a pretty shitty person if you did that now wouldn't you? It's also human nature to deny inconvenient truths, something of which you are very guilty, but that is considered unfair bias. You are considered a good person if you can admit your faults instead of denying them, and a bad person if you can't see them or accept them. It's NURTURE that's important in human society and frankly, if you're toxic, you deserve to be punished under this system. If they're toxic so do they, but that doesn't mean you don't. Get off your high horse, if your posts are anything to go by you're at least as bad as this intent feeder you keep complaining about.

If you took a look at the boards you'd also see that especially lately, people have gone out of their way, for  no discernible gain, to post positive thank you posts on these boards. These people aren't seeking attention like the negativity, they are simply sharing their enjoyment of a damn game. You can't look at only one side of a story then expect everyone to agree with you, it's an incredibly puerile way of doing things, i.e it's the kind of thing five year olds do.
Well..all I can say is..it was kinda amusing..now I just kinda pity you. Enjoy your life m8, in the end it's just a game.

In my opinion, it should say the title of the post that the content was removed from, so we can reflect and know what it was that was typed wrong, I really want to know what the two things i had removed were, I honestly have no idea.

It's not about embarrassing Riot, they're a multimillion dollar company what do they care about that? It's about keeping negativity OUT of the community not feeding more into it. Two wrongs do not make a right. If someone steals your wallet, and you go to their house and steal their TV, it's still a crime. Just because you are RESPONDING with toxicity, does not and should not get you off the hook.
yeah..... that was directed at Sephyre not you

See if he responds don't think he will tbh..because there was not a thing wrong with the title he should have just edited there names out....
I mean i can get a pick or ss of there stats and edit there names out that's easy as...
no girls on the internet m8

Lol yer it seems the game is full of them tbh....
Players are to scared to say anything even asking others not to feed when there 0-13 and they get reported as being toxic...

I mean here is another post...

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/kksFO3lY-stop-the-trolls

Do i have to dig more out to prove the point....really...
